C:/home/LearnHVAC/spark/class/PI.cc File Reference

Simple discrete-time PI controller - sampling interval = time-step(assumed fixed) Includes simple anti-windup and limiting of the output to the range 0-1. More...

#include "spark.h"

Include dependency graph for PI.cc:

Detailed Description

Simple discrete-time PI controller - sampling interval = time-step(assumed fixed) Includes simple anti-windup and limiting of the output to the range 0-1.

Todo:
Interface variables
  • PORT w [-] "set-point";
  • PORT y [-] "measured variable";
  • PORT iP [-] "previous value of integral term";
  • PORT Kp [-] "proportional gain";
  • PORT Ki [1/s] "integral gain";
  • PORT fr [-] "override (0), forward (+1) or reverse (-1) acting";
  • PORT bias [-] "offset, output in open loop";
  • PORT dt [s] "time step";
  • PORT u [-] "control signal";
  • PORT i [-] "integral term";
Functions
 u,i = PI(w,y,iP,Kp,Ki,fr,bias,dt)
